Invent Games Book¶

Lessons based on the book Invent Your Own Computer Games with Python by Al Sweigart.

Chapter 2: Writing Programs¶

This program prints the chapter name and title, then says hello and asks for the users name.

  • Book chapter

  • hello_world.py
